MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Interop.​RegistrationPolicies.​AutomaticRegistrationPolicy
MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Interop.​RegistrationPolicies.​DefaultRegistrationPolicy
public
MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Interop.​RegistrationPolicies.​AutomaticRegistrationPolicy

Similar to DefaultRegistrationPolicy, but with automatic type registration is disabled.

Functions
AllowTypeAutoRegistration
public override bool AllowTypeAutoRegistration(
Type type
)

Allows type automatic registration for the specified type.  NOTE: automatic type registration is NOT recommended.

Parameter
type
Type

The type.

Returns

True to register the type automatically, false otherwise.
